statements: SELECT * FROM vpn_status WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT connection_status, uptime FROM vpn_status WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, connection_status FROM vpn_status WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM vpn_status WHERE connection_status LIKE 'Connected%';
SELECT user_id, connection_status, uptime FROM vpn_status WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM vpn_status ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, connection_status, uptime FROM vpn_status WHERE connection_status = 'connected';
SELECT * FROM vpn_status WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY uptime ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, connection_status FROM vpn_status WHERE uptime > INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM vpn_status WHERE connection_status = 'disconnected';
SELECT * FROM vpn_connections;
SELECT id, username FROM vpn_connections WHERE connection_status='active';
SELECT id, connection_time, uptime_minutes FROM vpn_connections WHERE uptime_minutes > 60;
SELECT id, connection_status FROM vpn_connections ORDER BY connection_time DESC;
SELECT username, uptime_minutes FROM vpn_connections JOIN vpn_uptime ON vpn_connections.id = vpn_uptime.user_id;
SELECT id, username, connection_time FROM vpn_connections WHERE connection_status = 'active' ORDER BY connection_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, uptime_minutes FROM vpn_connections WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM vpn_uptime JOIN vpn_connections ON vpn_uptime.user_id = vpn_connections.id WHERE vpn_connections.connection_status = 'active';
SELECT username, connection_time, uptime_minutes FROM vpn_connections WHERE connection_status = 'active' ORDER BY uptime_minutes DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, username, connection_time, uptime_minutes FROM vpn_connections WHERE connection_status = 'inactive';
SELECT * FROM vpn_users;
SELECT user_id, username, vpn_ip FROM vpn_users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM vpn_sessions WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM vpn_sessions WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT log_time, log_message FROM vpn_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, vpn_ip FROM vpn_users WHERE connected = TRUE
SELECT * FROM vpn_sessions WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM vpn_sessions GROUP BY user_id
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM vpn_users
SELECT * FROM vpn_users JOIN vpn_sessions ON vpn_users.user_id = vpn_sessions.user_id
SELECT * FROM vpn_users;
SELECT username, ip_address FROM vpn_users WHERE vpn_status = TRUE;
SELECT server_name, location FROM vpn_servers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT user_id, server_id, start_time FROM vpn_connections WHERE end_time IS NULL;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM vpn_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vpn_users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, ip_address FROM vpn_users WHERE vpn_status = TRUE;
SELECT server_name, location, connection_limit FROM vpn_servers WHERE connection_limit >= 10;
SELECT username, server_name, start_time, end_time FROM vpn_users INNER JOIN vpn_connections ON vpn_users.user_id = vpn_connections.user_id;
SELECT connection_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM vpn_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM vpn_users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM vpn_users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT server_id, location, status FROM vpn_servers WHERE status = true;
SELECT connection_id, connection_start, connection_end FROM vpn_connections ORDER BY connection_start DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM vpn_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM vpn_users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM vpn_users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM vpn_connections WHERE status = TRUE);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS active_connections FROM vpn_connections WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT server_address, location, status FROM vpn_servers ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM vpn_users WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM vpn_usage_stats WHERE data_transfer > 1000000);
